title: Grand Canyon National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Find lesson plans about Grand Canyon geology, ecology, and human history for use before and after your field trip or independently in your classroom. All Curriculum Materials   Curriculum Materials    Lesson Plans Learn More     Field Trips Bring your class to the canyon in fall or spring for a curriculum-based educational field trip. All Field Trips   Field Trips    Plan Your Field Trip Learn More     Guest Speakers Ranger visits to classrooms in Arizona, southern Utah, and the Las Vegas area bring Grand Canyon to life each winter. All Guest Speakers   Guest Speakers    Guest Speakers Learn More     Institutes & Field Schools Outdoor learning expeditions abound at Grand Canyon, including half-day camps for kids, week-long summer camping trips for teens and a semester-long program for students enrolled in undergraduate school.
